/* eslint-disable jsx-a11y/anchor-is-valid */ import React from "react"; import img from "../../images/sort.png"; import { Container } from "react-bootstrap"; const ContDrobdown = ({title}) => { return (

{title}

  • الاعلى تقييماً

); }; export default ContDrobdown;
